revised_title: Investigating the Physiological Effects of Benzene and its Compounds on the Spinal Cord and Brain
tldr: This study examines the effects of benzene and its compounds on the spinal cord and brain, observing symptoms such as tremors, lethargy, and alterations in response to stimuli. The research also investigates the action of these substances on nerve and muscle function and their potential impact on various diseases affecting the spinal cord.
